item.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
item.description: Wow. I have just not watched many movies this year. I really should work on that. So let’s start with one of the weirdest and violent musicals out there: Sweeney Todd. I recently came across a YouTube video How the Music Spoils Sweeney Todd (and why that’s a good thing) that reminded me how much I enjoyed the music when we did it in high school (Not even kidding, not sure how that got approved…).
